description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Be a real bartender, 100 cocktails and 20 drinking games on your Xbox. More than 120 searchable ingredients to make sure you pick the right drink for the perfect occasion. Enjoy and impress your friends with your bartender attitudes! NEW! Now with two new features for a perfect party.
